text: Ata'eba tara ca'ite ke besi an'yayakari ye allah sanbandhe mithya racana kare athaba tamra nirdesabali pratyakhyana kare? Era'i, -- edera kache paumchube kitaba theke tadera bhaga. Sesa paryanta yakhana amadera dutara tadera kache asabe takhana tara tadera mrtyu ghatabe, tara balabe -- ''kothaya ache tara yadera tomara ahbana karate allah‌ke chere diye?’’ Tara balabe -- ''tara amadera theke cale geche. Ara tara nijedera birud'dhe saksya debe ye tara nihsandeha abisbasi chila.
